feed.title: eSIM Myanmar Entertainment Server

entry.title: eSIM Registration - 4 Providers Available
entry.summary: Register your eSIM with MPT, ATOM, U9, or MYTEL. 120,000 MMK activation with instant QR code delivery and Nexora AI verification.

entry.title: Nexora AI Chat Assistant
entry.summary: Ask AI for instant support on eSIM activation, pricing, device compatibility, and provider information.

entry.title: 5G and VoLTE Support
entry.summary: All providers now support 5G networks and VoLTE for high-quality voice calls over LTE.

entry.title: Holiday Season 2025-2026
entry.summary: Festive theme with animated Santa guide and New Year 2026 countdown. Active until January 31, 2026.
